title: Bohr model - electron speed in orbit of radius r

content.question: In the Bohr model of an atom, a nucleus has positive charge <math alttext="positive 4 e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>e</mi></mpadded></math>.
